thread.title: Former All Black Sione Lauaki passes away, aged 35 - Yahoo New Zealand
thread.title_full: Former All Black Sione Lauaki passes away, aged 35 - Yahoo New Zealand

author: Yahoo New Zealand On February
title: Former All Black Sione Lauaki passes away, aged 35 - Yahoo New Zealand
text:
Former All Black Sione Lauaki passes away, aged 35 - Yahoo New Zealand Former Chiefs and All Blacks forward Sione Lauaki has passed away, aged 35. Close Sione Lauaki smashes Richie McCaw UP NEXT VIDEO Sione Lauaki fends Richie McCaw. Source: SKY Sione Lauaki smashes Richie McCaw 
According to One News , Lauaki was understood to have been suffering kidney problems. 
The blockbusting forward had recently been on dialysis having been diagnosed with renal failure and cardiovascular problems in 2012. 
Lauaki made his debut for the Chiefs in 2004. Sione Lauaki. Photo: Getty 
He played 70 Super Rugby matches and secured an All Blacks call-up in 2005. 
He was capped 17 times for New Zealand. Photos: Getty 
Leaving for French Top 14 side Clermont Auvergne in 2010, Lauaki made the move to Bayonne in 2011. 
He emerged out of Kelston Boys High and played for New Zealand Colts, making his Auckland debut in 2002.
